channel.title: Chunks special mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Chunks special mission"

item.title: Re: Chunks special mission
item.content:encoded: So you did … but why did you put it in "General" instead of "Missions"? This is where I'd expect mission-specific things to be…

item.title: Re: Chunks special mission
item.content:encoded: If you had looked a little bit more, you'd have seen that I opened the same thread already, and the answer was 'yes'.

item.title: Chunks special mission
item.content:encoded: I know that you have to be on this mission to get the various drops … but has anybody tried to drop the mission to do some OTHER special missions and then retake it, and did you keep the various body parts?
